items.sentence: Please tell Tom that he's required to do that.
Please tell Tom he has to do that before 2:30.
Please tell Tom I need to do that before 2:30.
Please tell Tom I don't need to do that today.
It's obvious that Tom doesn't want to do that.
It's obvious that Tom doesn't like doing that.
Tom won't likely need to do that anytime soon.
Tom won't find anyone who'll help him do that.
Tomorrow is the only day I plan on doing that.
Tom doesn't think anyone would really do that.
